channel.title: Comments on: Murder By Death album news

item.title: By: K
item.dc:creator: K
item.description: If ever there was reason to introduce the use of the hottie tag, now would be a good time.
item.content:encoded: If ever there was reason to introduce the use of the hottie tag, now would be a good time.

item.title: By: Logan Young
item.dc:creator: Logan Young
item.description: as long as it's not another dante's inferno retread - i think western civilization's had enough of that.
item.content:encoded: as long as it’s not another dante’s inferno retread – i think western civilization’s had enough of that.

item.title: By: patrick
item.dc:creator: patrick
item.description: also, why wasn't the tag for this "hotsican cello players"?
item.content:encoded: also, why wasn’t the tag for this “hotsican cello players”?

item.title: By: patrick
item.dc:creator: patrick
item.description: opening for murder by death in columbia are due east, brave horatius and ...for science!
item.content:encoded: opening for murder by death in columbia are due east, brave horatius and …for science!
